sentences.en: £130 million would be set aside for repairs to schools.
sentences.cn: 将划拨1.3亿英镑用于学校的修缮。

sentences.en: a chess set
sentences.cn: 一副国际象棋

sentences.en: Anthony picked himself up and set off along the track.
sentences.cn: 安东尼自己慢慢爬起来，又开始沿着跑道跑下去。

sentences.en: At lunchtime, there's a choice between the buffet or the set menu.
sentences.cn: 午餐可以吃自助餐，也可以选套餐。

sentences.en: Did you set the alarm ?
sentences.cn: 你把闹钟设定好了吗？

sentences.en: Fire may have breached the cargo tanks and set the oil ablaze.
sentences.cn: 大火当时有可能把货船上的油罐烧漏了，从而引燃原油。

sentences.en: he hadn't meant any harm but his few words had set her against him.
sentences.cn: 他毫无恶意，但他的几句话使她敌视他。

sentences.en: He loaded his vessel with another cargo and set sail.
sentences.cn: 他给自己的船装上另一批货后便启航了。

sentences.en: he wanted to set out his stall as someone who would balance the books and create a firm financial situation.
sentences.cn: 他想要展现才能，让人知道他是能使收支平衡，能创造稳固的财政态势的人。

sentences.en: his try-scoring ability and self-effacing modesty have set him apart.
sentences.cn: 他带球触对方端线的得分能力和谦虚精神使他鹤立鸡群。

sentences.en: Hundreds of tightly rolled newspapers were set aflame among the 50,000 crowd.
sentences.cn: 几百张卷紧的报纸在为数5万的人群中被点燃。

sentences.en: I was set to shut out anyone else who came knocking.
sentences.cn: 其他任何人来敲门，我都决意将其拒之门外。

sentences.en: Investors can apply for a package of shares at a set price.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以申购固定价格的股票组合。

sentences.en: Place the omelette under a gentle grill until the top is set.
sentences.cn: 将煎蛋饼放在烤架下用文火烘烤，直到表面凝固。

sentences.en: Remember to set the video to record the film.
sentences.cn: 别忘了把录像机设定好录下这部影片。

sentences.en: she &B{had her heart set on} going to university.
sentences.cn: 她渴望上大学。

sentences.en: that must have set you back a bit.
sentences.cn: 那一定让你花费了不少吧。

sentences.en: the bank expected to set aside about $700 million for restructuring.
sentences.cn: 银行预计拨出七亿美元用于重组。

sentences.en: The city police set up roadblocks to check passing vehicles.
sentences.cn: 该市警察设置了路障以检查过往车辆。

sentences.en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
sentences.cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

sentences.en: The questions were set up to make her look dumb.
sentences.cn: 问题这么设计，就是为了让她出丑。

sentences.en: The set (x, y) has two members.
sentences.cn: （x, y）这个集里有两个项。

sentences.en: there were books and rooms set apart as libraries.
sentences.cn: 有些书和房间留作图书馆之用。

sentences.en: They are set to make a big fat profit.
sentences.cn: 他们下定决心要大赚一笔。

sentences.en: This debate should be set in an international context .
sentences.cn: 这场辩论应该放在国际大背景下来看。

sentences.en: this incident undoubtedly set back research.
sentences.cn: 这一事件无疑阻碍了研究。

sentences.en: We post up a set of rules for the house.
sentences.cn: 我们张贴了一份房屋生活守则。

sentences.en: What was he doing when you last set eyes on him?
sentences.cn: 你上次见到他时他在做什么？

sentences.en: wives' allowances can henceforth be set against investment income.
sentences.cn: 今后妻子们的补贴可以用投资收益来抵消。

words.tran_cn: [机] 调节器；作曲者；排字工人；安装员，从事安装的人
一套；[数]集合；[机]装置；趋势；布景

phrases.tran_cn: 整套；[计]成套机组；完全集
陈述，提出；出发；陈列；宣布
v. 出发；引起；动身；使爆炸；抵销；分开
v. 建立；装配；开业；竖立
自以为；自命为；为…做准备

trans.tran_cn: 位于…的，安排好的，固定的，套（餐），有可能的，呆板的
trans.tran_en: being in the position that is mentioned

trans.tran_cn: 一套/副/组，一群人，电视/收音机，布景，摄影棚，（体育比赛）局，（数学）集合，姿态，发型，凝固，秧苗
trans.tran_en: a group of numbers, shapes etc in mathematics

trans.tran_cn: 放，置，使处于，以…为背景，设置，安排，确定，树立，开创，指派，凝固，接骨，给…配乐，落（下）
trans.tran_en: to carefully put something down somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 设置，调整；树立；摆放；日落
trans.tran_en: to carefully put something down somewhere
